item.description:
"I Am"  a transformational movie by Tom Shadyac

 

Tom Shadyac was a successful movie producer, living "the good life," and "having it all," in his own mind and in the eyes of those watching his life unfold.  A biking accident led to a traumatic brain injury which  made Tom question everything about his life as he knew it.  In Tom's own words, "I thought I had it all.  I learned I had it all WRONG."

 

"I Am" is a transformational movie inviting people to look at the meaning and purpose in their lives, what we are doing to address the critical issues we all face individually and collectively in today's world, with interviews from experts in many fields of human endeavor.

 

Join us to view this movie together, over a potluck lunch.  We meet from 11:30 - 1:15 pm, but I will check the run time of the movie to see if we need a longer window of time to see the whole thing.

 

We will meet at Helena's house in Newtonville.

 

Join us for a meaningful and stimulating community experience!

 

Let us know what you will bring to the potluck when you RSVP.

 

$10  Meetup fee.
item.how_to_find_us: We will welcome you at the door
item.name: February Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup: "I Am" the movie
